MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: Mapping to load data in to the target table External_AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER
MAPPING.NAME: m_EXT_AVYX_DMD_DR_HAA

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT EXTERNAL_CUSTOMER_HEADER.SCHEDULE_RUN as SCHEDULE_RUN, EXTERNAL_CUSTOMER_HEADER.CUSTOMER_CD as CUSTOMER_CD FROM EXTERNAL_CUSTOMER_HEADER EXTERNAL_CUSTOMER_HEADER

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT HBI_FISCAL_CALENDAR.WEEK_BEGIN_DATE as WEEK_BEGIN_DATE, HBI_FISCAL_CALENDAR.CALENDAR_DATE as CALENDAR_DATE FROM HBI_FISCAL_CALENDAR HBI_FISCAL_CALENDAR

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Expression to hardcode few column values
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_AVYX_DMD_DRVR

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT EPO.CUSTOMER_CD, EPO.DC_DUE_DATE, EPO.DC_LOCATION, EPO.ORDER_TYPE, EPO.EXTERNAL_SKU, EPO.ITEM_ID, EPO.SELLING_STYLE_CD, EPO.SELLING_COLOR_CD, EPO.SELLING_ATTRIBUTE_CD, EPO.SELLING_SIZE_CD, EPO.MFG_UNIT_QTY, EPO.EXIT_FACTORY_DATE, EPO.DEMAND_DRIVER, EPO.ORDER_NUMBER, EPO.ORDER_LINE_NUMBER FROM EXTERNAL_PURCHASE_ORDER EPO WHERE EPO.SELLING_STYLE_CD <> ' ' AND EPO.SELLING_COLOR_CD <> ' ' AND EPO.SELLING_ATTRIBUTE_CD <> ' ' AND EPO.SELLING_SIZE_CD <> ' ' AND EPO.SELLING_REVISION_NO <> -1 AND EPO.DC_LOCATION IS NOT NULL AND EPO.MFG_UNIT_QTY > 0 AND (EPO.AMENDMENT_NUMBER IS NULL OR EPO.AMENDMENT_NUMBER =' ') AND EPO.CUSTOMER_CD= 'HAA'

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Expression to hardcode few column values
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_AVYX_DMD_DRVR

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Maximum Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
Maximum Percentage of Total Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
Additional Concurrent Pipelines for Lookup Cache Creation
Save session log for these runs
Session Log File Max Time Period

SESSION.DESCRIPTION: session to run the mapping m_EXTRNL_AVYX_DMND_DRVR
SESSION.NAME: s_m_EXT_AVYX_DMD_DR_HAA

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Pre SQL
ATTRIBUTE.VALUE: DELETE FROM EXTERNAL_AVYX_DEMAND_DRIVER WHERE CUSTOMER_CD='HAA'; COMMIT;

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Save session log for these runs

TASKINSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: session to run the mapping m_EXTRNL_AVYX_DMND_DRVR
TASKINSTANCE.NAME: s_m_EXT_AVYX_DMD_DR_HAA

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Error message for this task's execution

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Error message for this task's execution
